name: Lancer
description: The ancient Lancers were marvels beyond compare in their time, built to protect the realm in its greatest hours of need. As time marches on and the giants sleep, the secrets of their construction have long since disappeared... but hope remains that they will answer the call.

skinlines.name: Lancer
skinlines.description: With the times growing dire, the great mechanized Lancers of old rouse from their slumber. Taller than any building and more powerful than any army, they rise to protect their subjects before returning to the earth once more.
